00038 template <typename Point>
00039 class FilterKruskal
00040 {
00041   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00042   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00043   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00044   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point>*>::iterator WspPIter;
00045   typedef std::pair<Edge, float> WEdge;
00046   typedef comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* CqPtr;
00047   
00048 public:
00049   
00055   void run(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int THold=0, int KruskalTHold=500)
00056   {
00057     pivot_index = (1000*wspd.Points.size())/(end-begin);
00058     double thold = floor(log((double)wspd.Points.size()));
00059     if(THold != 0) thold = THold;
00060     recurse_filter_kruskal3(begin, end, (int) thold, KruskalTHold);
00061   };
00062 
00069   FilterKruskal(pwspd<Point> &w, int_partition &uf, 
00070                 std::vector<Edge> &mst, size_type t=20) : wspd(w), 
00071                                                      ufpred(uf,w.cqtree, w.Points),
00072                                                      Uf(uf), 
00073                                                      Mst(mst),
00074                                                      threshold(t)
00075   {
00076     bccpTotal=0;
00077     samples.resize(1000);
00078   };

00080 private:
00081   pwspd<Point> &wspd;
00082   bccpPred<Point> bccp;
00083   boxLengthPred<Point> blpred;
00084   unionFindPred<Point> ufpred;
00085   boxDistPredMin<Point> bdpredmin;
00086   boxDistPredMax<Point> bdpredmax;
00087   bccpDistPred<Point> bccppred;
00088   calcBccpPred<Point> calcbccppred;

00092   size_type pivot_index;
00093   int bccpTotal;
00094   int wspd_size;
00095   std::vector<WspIter> samples;

00097   WspIter findPivot(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00098   {
00099     double range = (double) (end-begin);
00100     
00101     for(unsigned int i=0;i < samples.size();++i)
00102       {
00103         samples[i] = (begin+((size_type) (__drand48__()*range)));
00104       }
00105     
00106     sort(samples.begin(), samples.end(), bccp);
00107     return samples[pivot_index];
00108   };
00109   int updateTHold(int THold, int param)
00110   {
00111     return THold*param*floor(log((double)wspd.Points.size()));;
00112   }
00113 
00114   void recurse_filter_kruskal3(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int Thold, int KruskalTHold)
00115   {
00116     if(end-begin == 0) return;
00117 
00118     //Walk through the loop
00119     //for every element of
00120     //size > threshold,
00121     //calculate the BCCP
00122     //and maintain the minimum
00123     //non-computed bccp
00124     WspIter I;
00125     double minBccp = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
00126     calcbccppred.minBccp = &minBccp;
00127     calcbccppred.THold = Thold;
00128 #ifdef _GLIBCXX_PARALLEL
00129     I = partition(begin, end, calcbccppred, __gnu_parallel::sequential_tag());
00130 #else
00131     I = partition(begin, end, calcbccppred);
00132 #endif
00133     //Partition the computed BCCP into 
00134     //everything smaller and larger than the
00135     //smallest non-computed BCCP
00136     bdpredmin.minBccp = minBccp;
00137     WspIter cpart = partition(begin, I, bdpredmin);
00138     //Partition and process every computed
00139     //BCCP smaller than the smallest non_computed
00140     //BCCP
00141     part_and_process(begin, cpart, KruskalTHold);
00142     if(Mst.size() >= wspd.Points.size())
00143       return;
00144     
00145     
00146     //Filter everything that's left
00147     WspIter fpart = partition(cpart, end, ufpred);
00148     //Repeat with double the threshold
00149     recurse_filter_kruskal3(cpart, fpart, Thold*2, KruskalTHold);
00150     
00151   };
00152   
00153   void part_and_process(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int KruskalTHold)
00154   {
00155     if((unsigned int) (end-begin) < KruskalTHold)
00156     {
00157         Kruskal(begin, end);
00158     }
00159     else
00160       {
00161         WspIter I = findPivot(begin, end);
00162         bdpredmin.minBccp = I->get_bccp_dist();
00163         I = partition(begin, end, bdpredmin);
00164         Kruskal(begin, I);
00165         if(Mst.size() >= wspd.Points.size())
00166           return;
00167         WspIter fpart = partition(I, end, ufpred);
00168         part_and_process(I, fpart, KruskalTHold);
00169       }
00170   }
00171 
00172   void Kruskal(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00173   {
00174     size_type first, second;
00175     Point *f,*s,*z;
00176 
00177     if(end-begin==0) return;
00178 
00179     sort(begin, end, bccp);
00180     //Find the address of the first element in
00181     //The z-order sorted vector of points
00182     z = &(*(wspd.Points.begin()));
00183     
00184     for(WspIter i=begin;i != end;++i)
00185       {
00186         //Find the index of the bccp points
00187         //from the pointer to them
00188         f = (Point*) (i->first);
00189         s = (Point*) (i->second);
00190         first = f-z;
00191         second = s-z;
00192 
00193         //Check the Union Find data structure
00194         //if the bccp points are not allready
00195         //connected, join them in the UF and add
00196         //them to the MST
00197         if(Uf.find(first) != Uf.find(second))
00198         {
00199           Mst.push_back(Edge(first, second));
00200           Uf.union_blocks(first, second);
00201           if(Mst.size() >= wspd.Points.size())
00202             return;
00203         }
00204       }
00205   };
00206   
00207   void recurse_filter_kruskal(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int THold)
00208   {
00209     
00210     WspIter part,fpart, part1, part2;
00211         
00212     if(end-begin < 1000)
00213       {
00214         Kruskal(begin, end);
00215       }
00216     else
00217       {
00218         findPivot(begin, end, bdpredmin, bdpredmax);
00219 
00220         do
00221           {
00222             MyTimer A;
00223             part1 = partition(begin, end, bdpredmin);
00224             std::cout << "Part1 size: " << end-begin << " Time: " << A << std::endl;
00225             if(part1==begin) bdpredmin.minBccp*=2;
00226           }
00227         while(part1==begin);
00228 
00229         bdpredmax.maxBccp = bdpredmin.minBccp;
00230         part2 = partition(part1, end, bdpredmax);
00231         do_bccp(part1, part2);
00232         bccppred.maxBccp = bdpredmin.minBccp;
00233         part  = partition(part1, part2, bccppred);
00234         Kruskal(begin, part);
00235         fpart = partition(part, end, ufpred);
00236         recurse_filter_kruskal(part, fpart, THold);
00237       }
00238   }
00239 
00240   void do_bccp(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00241   {
00242     for(WspIter i=begin;i != end;++i)
00243       (*i).bccp();
00244   }
00245   
00246 void recurse_filter_kruskal2(WspIter begin, WspIter end, int Thold)
00247 {
00248   std::cout << Thold << " Range: " << end-begin << std::endl;
00249   if(end-begin == 0) return;
00250 
00251   //Walk through the loop
00252   //for every element of
00253   //size > threshold,
00254   //calculate the BCCP
00255   WspIter I;
00256   for(I=begin;I != end;++I)
00257     {
00258       if(I->size()<=Thold)
00259         {
00260           //std::cout << I->size() << std::endl;
00261           I->bccp();
00262         }
00263     }
00264 
00265   //Sort all valid WSPs based on
00266   //BCCP value (Note: in this case
00267   //BCCP is either the actual BCCP value
00268   //or the minimum possible BCCP value)
00269   std::cout << "sorting" << std::endl;
00270   sort(begin, end, bccp);
00271 
00272   //Find the first WSP for which the BCCP
00273   //Has not yet been calculated
00274   I=begin;
00275   while(I->bccp_done())
00276     {
00277       ++I;
00278     }
00279   std::cout << "Minimum non-computed bccp: " << I->get_bccp_dist() << std::endl;
00280   std::cout << "\tTo Kruskal: " << I-begin <<  " " << begin->size() << " " << end-begin << std::endl;
00281 
00282   //Send the first block of WSPs
00283   //That have had their BCCP calulated
00284   //To be tested/added to the MST
00285   Kruskal2(begin, I);
00286 
00287   //Partition the remaining WSPs to filter
00288   //out any pairs that have allready been
00289   //connected
00290   std::cout << "Filtering" << std::endl;
00291   WspIter fpart = partition(I, end, ufpred);
00292   std::cout << "filtered : " << end-fpart << std::endl;
00293 
00294   //Double the threshold value and recurse on any elements
00295   //that are left
00296   recurse_filter_kruskal2(I, fpart, Thold*2);
00297 }
00298 
00299   void Kruskal2(WspIter begin, WspIter end)
00300   {
00301     size_type first, second;
00302     Point *f,*s,*z;
00303 
00304     if(end-begin==0) return;
00305 
00306     //Find the address of the first element in
00307     //The z-order sorted vector of points
00308     z = &(*(wspd.Points.begin()));
00309     
00310     for(WspIter i=begin;i != end;++i)
00311       {
00312         //Find the index of the bccp points
00313         //from the pointer to them
00314         f = (Point*) (i->first);
00315         s = (Point*) (i->second);
00316         first = f-z;
00317         second = s-z;
00318 
00319         //Check the Union Find data structure
00320         //if the bccp points are not allready
00321         //connected, join them in the UF and add
00322         //them to the MST
00323         if(Uf.find(first) != Uf.find(second))
00324         {
00325           Mst.push_back(Edge(first, second));
00326           Uf.union_blocks(first, second);
00327         }
00328       }
00329   };
